response.overview: Mark Gemini is known for taking straight men right off the street and convincing them to try gay sex. We know it happens, but we rarely get to see how it’s done! Here Mark allows the curtain to be pulled back as you see four of his conversions in their raw state. Eli Channing, Miles and Rob Anthony all walk in as virgins and leave as wanton butt sluts. In Austin’s case this was a retraining after a 3 year hiatus.
response.title: First Fuck
